Q_DESC:
Sam and sanu are roommates .Due to preparations of Fest Sanu is got frustrated and wanted to do some task to divert his mind.He ask sam to suggest a game .

Sam describes the game - he give a number n to sanu. he covert it to binary form and replace 0 with '}' and 1 with' { 'in binary string.if string is closed than print Great number! otherwise print No 

closed string follow this rules:

1. s1=  is closed string.

2. s2={s1} and s3={}s1 both of them are also closed string.

3. eg. {}{{}} ,{}{}, {{}}{}{} are closed string while {}{{} , {{{{{} and {}}{{} are not closed strings.
Input
 The first line containing an integer,N
 
Output
 For each testcase ,print whether it is great number or not.
